reviewText:
I have three of Dowling's earlier instructional videos, and a practice CD.  This "Roadmap"
is accurately titled.  It is not detailed guitar instruction, but rather guidance for advanced
playing and arranging.  His explanation of how he came up with his arrangement of "Maria Elena"
makes a lot of sense to me.

Mike seems like a very nice and decent guy, having said that , his teaching stlye leaves me cold. Way too much talking and limited demo. I really didn`t know it was all about altered tunings. I am sure it is just my problem but for my money I will stick with Toby Walker or Happy Traum in the future!!
